summary.span: 用來將環境感知運算式轉換為活動樹狀結構的轉換 API。

span.span: A transformation API used to convert environment aware expressions to an activity tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Activities.Activity`1<!!TResult> Convert<TResult>(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression`1<class System.Func`2<class System.Activities.ActivityContext, !!TResult>> expression) cil managed

typeparam.name: TResult
typeparam.span: 要轉換成的運算式型別。

span.span: The type the expression is being converted to.

summary.span: 將工作流程環境感知運算式轉換為活動樹狀。

span.span: Converts a workflow environment-aware expression to an activity tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需 的程式碼範例，請參閱 。For a code example of , see . 中的轉換方法是設計成使用在工作流程內部定義的變數和常數，或是經由引數傳入工作流程的變數和常數。The conversion methods in are designed to work with variables and constants defined inside the workflow, or passed into the workflow via arguments.
